name.ja: <ruby>浅<rt>あさ</rt></ruby>すぎた<ruby>墓<rt>はか</rt></ruby><ruby>穴<rt>あな</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: Your opponent has 2 or less monsters on their field and a monster in their Graveyard.

effect.en: Special Summon 1 monster from your Graveyard to your field in face-down Defense Position. Then, your opponent can Special Summon 1 monster from their Graveyard to their field in face-down Defense Position.
